title: Chapter 4509 - Chapter 4509: 4508 Was Completely Annihilated
body:
Chapter 4509 - Chapter 4509: 4508 Was Completely Annihilated

Chapter 4509: 4508 was completely annihilated

“Damn that guy, he actually destroyed one of my bodies.”

At the center of the Mechanical Ascension Universe.

The entire center of the Mechanical Ascension Universe was transformed by powerful machines.

At the center, in an energy pool, the mechanical God’s body slowly sat up.

At this moment, his expression was abnormally ugly!

His death also meant that his powerful body had been completely destroyed.

The machine ascended to the universe. After their experts died, their cultivation system was different from the others.

Their bodies were made of powerful treasures and powerful metals.

Just like his previous body, there were three heavenly fate treasures in his body.

This loss was too great for him!

He sat up, and the surrounding metal slowly surrounded him.

Slowly, it began to strengthen.

His pupils were filled with hatred.

Even though that mysterious chaos expert was very mysterious.

However, he was still filled with hatred towards him.

If he had the chance, he would definitely make him pay a terrible price!

“Ka Ka Ka!”

“Ka Ka Ka!”

However, at this moment, he suddenly felt a terrifying and strange power attacking him.

This terrifying power caused him to tremble and feel shocked!

He felt his soul begin to crumble once again.

He felt that death was about to arrive.

“No, no, no!”

“How is this possible? How can I be attacked while I’m here?”

The mechanical god was completely terrified at this moment.

He was completely terrified!

He was currently in the center of the mechanical universe.

He was in an absolutely safe place?

How could he possibly be attacked?

How was this possible?

“How can this power be so similar to the cursed demonic spirit’s death curse? He clearly isn’t a cursed demonic spirit!”

“Oh no, this body is about to die too!”

The God of machinery roared with a face full of fear!

His life force was dissipating rapidly.

At the same time, at the side of the Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens.

Wang Xian crushed the virtual image of the god of machinery once again.

However, the virtual image of the next god of machinery began to condense once again!

At this moment, he stretched out his hand once again to pinch it.

He wanted to completely destroy this automaton God.

He also wanted to test how strong this cursed Devil Spirit’s power was!

…

At this moment, it was also at the center of the automaton universe.

Another body of the automaton God started to resurrect.

He had many bodies, but with each resurrection, the automaton power around his body would be greatly reduced.

Hua La

When his body walked out of the energy pool, the mechanical God’s face was full of panic.

He had a bad premonition!

At this moment, he didn’t hesitate at all. With a wave of his arm, a communication device appeared in his hand.

He immediately gave an order to all the Great Beings in the mechanical ascension universe.

At the same time, he sent a distress signal to the divine spring of the Spirit Ascension Universe and the three gods of the three-three universe!

He was completely panicking.

Now, he could already guess why the dozen or so heaven origin creation realm experts in the mechanical ascension universe were completely annihilated.

It was this mysterious expert who did it.

He had the energy of a cursed devil spirit and could completely kill them.

This ability was extremely effective against their mechanical ascension to the universe!

If he were to continue being cursed…

He might die as well!

He was one of the top three powerhouses of the ten-day federation.

However, he had a few hundred heaven origin creation-level subordinates!

He didn’t want to die!

…

“What?”

At this moment, all the powerhouses beside Jiu Tian were still shocked by Wang Xian’s ability.

The machine flew into the universe. It was a full-strength attack from more than a hundred powerhouses of the Heaven’s origin realm.

Such an attack was easily evaded by that mysterious powerhouse.

The god of machinery died at his hands.

He did not have the slightest ability to resist.

An existence at the level of chaos actually did not have the slightest ability to resist. It could be said that he was killed in an instant!

This made all the powerhouses, even the six powerhouses at the level of chaos, a little dazed.

All of them looked at Wang Xian with shock and fear!

This? ? ? ?

What kind of realm was he at to be able to do this?

“Our god of machinery was actually killed!”

“This is impossible, this…”

“What kind of strength does he have? He was able to easily dodge our all-out attack. How is this possible?”

“Oh no, that mysterious powerhouse, Wu Tongming’s master, is too terrifying!”

All the experts in the mechanical ascension universe were even more shocked!

The mechanical god almost instantly killed them.

Facing their attacks, they could easily dodge!

The strength he displayed made them tremble.

It made them feel suffocated!

“Not good, the mechanical God sent us a message. After he resurrected, he is still suffering from the destructive curse attack.”

At this moment, the Mechanical God flew into the universe. All the heaven origin creation powerhouses received this message at the same time.

When they saw this message, their scalps exploded!

After the mechanical God died, he was still facing the attack of death.

He was still being wiped out.

This? ?

How was this possible?

“What?”

“I also received this message.”

At this moment, the three primal chaos existences of the three three universes, the three gods, had received this message.

The godly spring of the Spirit Universe had also received this message.

Looking at the Mechanical God’s cry for help, they were somewhat shocked.

The mechanical god that had been killed once had been destroyed once again?

Could the other party cause the mechanical God to die completely?

This method made them think of the cursed demonic spirit.

They looked at the mysterious expert and the Mechanical God’s Phantom in front of him.

The next moment, they saw the mechanical god’s phantom being crushed.

After that, another one condensed!

And at this moment, they received the mechanical God’s distress signal once again.

The Mechanical God had been killed once again.

The other party had the power to completely destroy the automaton God!

This left them extremely shocked!

This was the first time they had met a great being that could completely destroy a primal chaos level existence.

It was too terrifying!

“Not good, the automaton God has once again called for help. Attack him, attack him!”

“Stop him, he is cursing us, the automaton God, to stop him!”

At this moment, the eyes of more than a hundred experts who had ascended into the universe were about to pop out of their sockets.

They unleashed terrifying attacks at the same time and attacked Wang Xian once again!

Boom

Boom

An area-of-effect attack was launched towards Wang Xian.

With this attack, even existences at the chaos realm would die if they were hit head-on!

Wang Xian glanced at their attack with an extremely calm expression!
